description: Mobile techniques used by Exobot, ATT&CK software S0522 (v1.0)
name: Exobot (S0522)

techniques.comment: [Exobot](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0522) can request device administrator permissions.(Citation: Threat Fabric Exobot)
[Exobot](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0522) has used HTTPS for C2 communication.(Citation: Threat Fabric Exobot)
[Exobot](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0522) can lock the device with a password and permanently disable the screen.(Citation: Threat Fabric Exobot)
[Exobot](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0522) has registered to receive the `BOOT_COMPLETED` broadcast intent.(Citation: Threat Fabric Exobot)
[Exobot](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0522) has used web injects to capture users’ credentials.(Citation: Threat Fabric Exobot)
[Exobot](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0522) can show phishing popups when a targeted application is running.(Citation: Threat Fabric Exobot)
[Exobot](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0522) has used names like WhatsApp and Netflix.(Citation: Threat Fabric Exobot)
[Exobot](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0522) can access the device’s contact list.(Citation: Threat Fabric Exobot)
[Exobot](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0522) can intercept SMS messages.(Citation: Threat Fabric Exobot)
[Exobot](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0522) can open a SOCKS proxy connection through the compromised device.(Citation: Threat Fabric Exobot)
[Exobot](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0522) can forward SMS messages.(Citation: Threat Fabric Exobot)

[Exobot](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0522) can obtain a list of installed applications and can detect if an antivirus application is running, and close it if it is.(Citation: Threat Fabric Exobot)
[Exobot](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0522) can obtain the device’s country and carrier name.(Citation: Threat Fabric Exobot)
[Exobot](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0522) can obtain the device’s IMEI, phone number, and IP address.(Citation: Threat Fabric Exobot)
[Exobot](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0522) can obtain the device’s IMEI, phone number, and IP address.(Citation: Threat Fabric Exobot)
